Uses of Package
nl.inl.util

  • Packages that use nl.inl.util 
    Package Description
    nl.inl.blacklab.externalstorage
    Deals with storing the original content in UTF-16 for quickly making concordances.
    nl.inl.blacklab.index
    Classes related to indexing.
    nl.inl.blacklab.perdocument
    Classes for dealing with per-document resultsets (instead of per-hits resultsets, which BlackLab mostly deals with)
    nl.inl.blacklab.search
    Contains the main BlackLab classes.
    nl.inl.util
    Miscellaneous utility functions.
  • Classes in nl.inl.util used by nl.inl.blacklab.externalstorage 
    Class and Description
    VersionFile
    Reads/writes a type/version file for a directory, to indicate the version of the directory's contents.
  • Classes in nl.inl.util used by nl.inl.blacklab.index 
    Class and Description
    CountingReader
    A Reader decorator that keeps track of the number of characters read.
  • Classes in nl.inl.util used by nl.inl.blacklab.perdocument 
    Class and Description
    ThreadPriority.Level
    The different priorities a thread can have in our system.
  • Classes in nl.inl.util used by nl.inl.blacklab.search 
    Class and Description
    ThreadPriority.Level
    The different priorities a thread can have in our system.
  • Classes in nl.inl.util used by nl.inl.util 
    Class and Description
    FileUtil.FileTask
    A task to execute on a file.
    TarGzipReader.FileHandler
    Handles a file inside the .tar.gz archive.
    ThreadPriority.Level
    The different priorities a thread can have in our system.
    VersionFile
    Reads/writes a type/version file for a directory, to indicate the version of the directory's contents.
